title: Sales Dashboard (Power BI)
problem: Visualize and analyze sales data to identify trends and insights.
learnings: Data modeling, DAX basics, dashboard design, storytelling with data.

title: Customer Churn Analysis
problem: Predict which customers are likely to leave using sample data.
learnings: Data cleaning, basic analytics, visualization, business insight.

title: Survey Data Visualization
problem: Present survey results in a clear, interactive format.
learnings: Data import, chart selection, user-friendly reporting.
